sentences.en: A style with ornamental, poetic , curvilinear forms and lyrical the great peoplemes.
sentences.cn: 融装饰性 、 诗化的 、 曲线的形式和抒情主题为一体的艺术.

sentences.en: Commentaries on Lyrical Work, Wang Guowei, Wen Guo Bookshop, Tainan, 1986.
sentences.cn: 人间词话, 王国维, 文国书局, 台南, 1986.

sentences.en: He waxed lyrical about the skills and commitment of his employees.
sentences.cn: 他津津乐道于员工的技能和敬业精神。
他的画作变得更加热情奔放。

sentences.en: Lily's incisive lyrical observations belie her years.
sentences.cn: 莉莉尖锐的歌词掩饰她真实的年龄.

sentences.en: MacDiarmid wanted to repudiate his lyrical quality.
sentences.cn: 麦克迪阿来德想要放弃他的抒情格调.

sentences.en: She reminds us of those lyrical tree nymphs in Greek mythology.
sentences.cn: 她使我们想起了希腊神话中如抒情诗般的树之仙女.

sentences.en: She was lyrical over her new coat.
sentences.cn: 她对她的新外套赞赏不已.

sentences.en: The lyrical state is a state beyond forms and systems.
sentences.cn: 抒情是一种超乎于一切形式与法则的状态.

sentences.en: There's a wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony.
sentences.cn: 在交响乐中间有一段美妙的抒情长笛独奏.

sentences.en: There's wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony.
sentences.cn: 在交响乐中间有一段奇妙的抒情长笛独奏.

sentences.en: This is a lyrical work written with the authority and assuredness of an experienced writer.
sentences.cn: 这部抒情作品由一位有经验的作家以老练、自信的笔触写成。

sentences.en: This juxtaposition of brutal reality and lyrical beauty runs through Park's stories.
sentences.cn: 这种残忍的现实和浪漫美好事物的并存始终贯穿于帕克的短篇小说中。

sentences.en: Through lyrical expressions and enabling connectivity, the world was changed.
sentences.cn: 通过抒情的表达已经使得连接成为可能, 世界杯改变了.

sentences.en: To be lyrical means you cannot stay closed up inside yourself.
sentences.cn: 抒情即意味着你不能继续故步自封了.

sentences.en: waxing lyrical about his splendid son-in-law.
sentences.cn: 热情地谈论他的好女婿。

words.tran_cn: 抒情性；抒情诗体；抒情方式抒情
抒情诗人；（流行歌曲等的）歌词作者
弹七弦琴的人；抒情诗人

trans.tran_cn: 热情奔放的，抒情般的，感情丰富的
trans.tran_en: beautifully expressed in words, poetry, or music
